Message: Add changelog to "Help" mode
Menu entries to clear CPU/Memory
Re-enabled ability to view licenses of included Products
Added Web Assembly builds, deployed regularly to https://compsys-pep.com/
Added ability to filter help items to a selected abstraction & architecture
Changed default monospace font to Courier Prime
Use system's colors in native menu bars
Improve Web Assembly download speeds by reducing build size
Clear debugger's CPU & Memory on start of new simulation
Fixed higlighting of mode buttons on application startup
In assembly source editor, style text using theme's italic/bold settings
Import syntax highlighting colors from Pep/9
On menu items: "Build > Execute", or "Debug > Start Debugging", switch active mode to "Debugger"
Add menu entry "Build > Assemble then Load Object Code"
Hide menu entry "Build > Format Object Code" when not in ISA3 project
Enable projects for "Pep/10, Asmb3, bare metal"
Reduce vertical clipping in debugger's CPU pane
Remove alternate column color bands from Memory Hex Dump
Add Symbol Table Viewer to Debugger
Replace icons on "Welcome" mode cards with abstraction-specific artwork
In "Welcome" mode, create uniform grid layout for abstractions and levels
Prevent "Build > Format Object Code" from deleting all object code in some cases
Increase size of icons in application toolbar
Display project's architecture and abstraction in tab control
In WASM builds, use our Pepp logo instead of Qt's default logo
